configuration.title: Controlling Configuration
configuration.noDefaultChartColumn: The Chart Container must at least consist of one default setting for Chart
configuration.isNotVisible: Is not visible in Project Controls
configuration.codeFormat: The code should only includes 'A~Z' or '0~9' or '_', and must start with 'A~Z' OR '_'
configuration.wrongOrSelfCode: These codes do not exist or refer to the formula itself:
configuration.canotUseType: This type of data cannot be repeated
configuration.formulaError: This type of formula only can type in number
configuration.formulaError1: This type of formula shouldn't only type in number
configuration.noRelativeFormula: There is no Formula refers to this record
configuration.noDefault4CurrFormula: This type Formula must at least consist of one default setting
configuration.errorFormulaAggregateWithFactor: Formula Aggregates should be SUM or Empty if formula contains factor formula
configuration.formulaIsInUse: Formula Definition(s) are in use, cannot be deleted
configuration.explainDetail: a js executable expression, returns a cell's value; ex: VAL() >= 100 && VAL() <= 200, this is to check if a cell's value is between 100 and 200, among the comparing columns
configuration.repeatedCondition: This condition is defined more than once
configuration.noDefaultVersionCompConfig: The Version Comparison Container must at least consist of one default setting
